title: Sports court (outside), Disposal, Individual Climate Control
posting_body: ['With finishes and wide-open spaces, each floor plan from Topaz brings you style without sacrificing on comfort.', 'Las Vegas hotspots and Uptown infuse Topaz with vibrant energy.', 'Purely contemporary, the beautiful community playfully highlights the structure of the grounds and community attractions.', 'Take a tour today!', '-Covered Parking', '-Business Center', '-Carpeting', '-Pet Friendly', '-Updated Lavish Landscaping', '-New Comfortable BBQ Pit Area', '-New Designer Interior Paint Colors', '-Renovated and Expanded Clubhouse With a Refreshed Fitness Center', '-Newly Painted Exteriors', '-New Fully Renovated Interiors!', '-Newly Renovated Kitchens With Quartz Countertops, New Cabinets, and Stainless Steel Appliances', '-Upgraded Swimming Pool Areas With All New Furniture and Cabanas', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', '*Equal housing opportunity*']
